column5: Another great week at Sandy Haven Camp on Nip/Upper French.  Been going there for over 35 years and its about as good as it's ever been.   Three generations of Dietz boys hit the Nipissing grand slam.  Boated two muskies, had hooks in two more and numerous follows.   The walleye bite was hot with 40-50 fish days and limits of keepers.   Bass fishing, smallies and largemouth, was real good too.   That place is on fire!
Nice hear from you Marty. Dang yer boy is getting huge,what a monster. That is one hell of a fish fry sir.  Thanks for sharing.
Fun times for sure Marty and some outstanding fish,  good to hear you boys are still doing the family trip to Sandy.
Glad to hear you say 'it's as good as it's ever been'. Nipissing is still a gem.
Nice Muskie looks like you had a good week with plenty of action . Thanks for the report
You guys did great,  great looking fish. I fished West arm with my son last weekend in july and did great. Love Nipissing,  endless opportunities to fish and never disappoints. ?
Looks like another great family trip in the books Marty! Thanks for the report!
great pics boys, lots of fun, good fishing & food ! thanks for the share.
Looks like an awesome week with a great mixed bag.  Thanks!
Marty with the party. Nice week of fishing Marty thanks for sharing. Art
Looks like you guys had a great time! Nice variety of different fish species as well! Nipissing is a great body of water, don't get to fish it often enough!
sweet mixed bag.  love that place.
Great report, thanks for sharing. One of my favourite areas!
That's quite the bag of fish there!!! Nicely done!
some awesome pictures. I refuse to acknowledge the picture of the dirty sheephead...but the others? Fantastic
you guys made it look easy! nice shootin
